title: Smoothly integrate DiyaMD
text: Smoothly integrate DiyaMD with your existing office technology. DiyaMD can be used alone or with any telehealth and EMR products.
Directly access to patient's chief complaints, insurance information, vitals, medications, labs, and more - anywhere and anytime. HIPAA protected.
Improve your relationships with DiyaMD's mass information dissemination, patient-provider relationship support, and population management tools.
Remotely monitor patients and perform billable e-services to maximize your revenue.
